PreceptDef.label: shameful
PreceptDef.description: We are destined to greatness. Failure is not an option, and any unwanted results of our experimentations should be gotten rid of as soon as possible.

li.label: genetic failures
li.description: One of our genetics experiments failed, and a misshapen monstrosity is running around uncheked. We should get rid of it as soon as possible, for this shames us.

PreceptDef.label: disliked
PreceptDef.description: If a genetic experiment fails catastrophically, it is our duty to get rid of the unwanted results as soon as possible.

li.label: genetic failures
li.description: One of our genetics experiments failed. We should get rid of it as soon as possible.

PreceptDef.label: accepted
PreceptDef.description: Genetic experimentation is risky, and we must accept that failures are an unavoidable part of the process.
